page.title: 19Leisure / Recreation
page.content:
Events in Pitlessie.
Various events take place in the village for different age groups. Children and Teenagers are well catered for. Regular weekly clubs and associations for young people are:{Scouts,Sunday {School and Youth Club.}The Youth Club held on Friday nights is particularly popular. Leisure activites for adults in the village are: The{W.R.I.,Flower - {arranging, Keep Fit and Parents/ {Teachers association. The Flower and Bulb Show is a very popular event which is well supported by many keen gardening enthusiasts annually.
